message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.SE. 

The paper deals with the termination analysis of logic programs, which is a topic in programming languages and formal methods (cs.PL). It also discusses the relation between termination analysis and loop checking, which is a topic in logic and computation (cs.LO). The paper proposes an algorithm for automatic verification, which involves reasoning about the behavior of the program on concrete queries, and does not require additional mode or type information, which suggests a connection to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and databases (cs.DB). Finally, the paper emphasizes the ease of automation of the proposed method, which is a topic in software engineering (cs.SE).
